Detailed Description

Timer. Class that defines stop/start timers to get timing informations (CPU time, System time, Wall time or wall clock). The value that stores a timer is defined after a call to stop method and represents the delay (interval of time) between the calls to start and stop.

Author:
T. Gautier
Version:
Id
utils_timer.h,v 1.1.1.1 2006/01/11 15:24:34 thierry Exp

void Util::Timer::stop (  )  [inline]

Stop timers. The different times spent between the start and the stop method calls is given by methods usertime, systime, realtime.

Reimplemented from Util::WallTimer.
